description:
Don’t let slippage stand in the way of solving your latest problem. Keep this large bottle of liquid chalk on hand in your bouldering cave, or use it to refill you personal sized bottle when heading to the crag. Midnight Lightning’s liquid chalk goes on easily, dries quickly, and has a subtle citrus smell.

  • Rosin-free formula
  • Low-waste packaging uses 60% less materials and energy
  • Soft bottle design lets you squeeze out any excess air, so your liquid chalk lasts longer
  • Vegan formula contains 70% isopropyl alcohol
name: Midnight Lightning Liquid Chalk Pack 300mL
